text: United Abominations is the eleventh studio album by American thrash metal band Megadeth. It was released on May 15, 2007. The album was the first that Megadeth made as a member of Roadrunner Records. The album peaked at number eight on the Billboard 200. This was the band's highest chart since they released Youthanasia in 1994. == Songs == == References == Category:2007 albums Category:Megadeth albums Category:Roadrunner Records albums
title: United Abominations
